project_name.justification: The project is explicitly named in the 'Project Name' section at the end of the document: 'Project Name [Vanadium Queen Project](/?gid=6473)'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified in the first sentence: 'Sassy Gold Corp. ("Sassy" or the "Company") (CSE:SASY) (OTCQB:SSYRF) (FSE:4E7) is pleased to announce that it has signed binding letters of intent... to acquire a total of fifteen (15) advanced uranium properties...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the acquiring company is identified in the 'CEO Comments' section: 'Mark Scott, Sassy's President and CEO, commented...'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states Sassy will 'acquire' the properties, but does not specify the percentage of interest being acquired.

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative primary commodity is U, and the article title is 'Sassy To Acquire Advanced Uranium Properties in Utah and Colorado'.

verified_article_link.justification: The article announces the acquisition of a portfolio of 15 uranium properties, and the document explicitly lists the 'Vanadium Queen Project' as one of the projects involved.

currency.justification: The currency is explicitly stated in the transaction terms and in a concluding note: 'Sassy will pay a total value of $8,391,326 USD...' and 'All currency within the news release is intended to be in USD, unless otherwise stated.'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The value is calculated as the project's 1/15th share of the total cash consideration. Total cash is $2,097,832 upfront plus a potential $300,000 in PEA bonuses ($100,000 for each of the three LOIs), totaling $2,397,832. $2,397,832 / 15 properties = $159,855.47. Source text: 'a total of $2,097,832 USD will be paid in cash' and 'each LOI includes a provision which will pay a maximum of one "PEA Bonus" per LOI, in the amount of $100,000 cash'.

share_payments_raw.justification: The value is calculated as the project's 1/15th share of the total share consideration. The total transaction value is $8,391,326 USD, with 75% payable in shares, equating to $6,293,494.50. $6,293,494.50 / 15 properties = $419,566.30. Source text: 'Sassy will pay a total value of $8,391,326 USD... with 75% of the Transaction's value payable in Shares.'

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Data was populated into the separate cash and share payment fields as per the extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The number of shares for the main transaction is not yet determined, as stated: 'The value and number of the Shares will be determined by the price of the financing completed immediately prior to the closing of the Transaction'. While a PEA bonus includes shares, the primary transaction share amount is unknown, so this field is left null.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options are mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: The share price for the transaction is not yet determined: 'The value and number of the Shares will be determined by the price of the financing completed immediately prior to the closing of the Transaction'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters is mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No monetary exploration commitment is mentioned in the text.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The vendors retained a 1% gross royalty, which is treated as an NSR for this field. 'The Vendors maintain a 1% gross royalty on most of the properties...'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The value is calculated as the project's 1/15th share of the total 8,200 acre area for the 15 properties acquired. 8,200 / 15 = 546.67. Source text: 'All of these properties, comprising 8,200 acres or 33 sq. km...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the total area is specified as acres. 'All of these properties, comprising 8,200 acres...'

resource_size.justification: The text does not provide a quantified mineral resource estimate for the acquired properties. It states, 'A Qualified Person (as defined in NI 43-101) has not done sufficient work to verify the historical drilling data... Sassy is not treating the historical data as current and it should not be relied upon.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer, Sassy Gold Corp., is identified with the ticker and exchange '(CSE:SASY)' in the first paragraph of the press release.
